about.title: About Us
about.content: Welcome to Lumo! We are passionate about providing the best products and customer service.

shipping.title: Shipping Policy
shipping.content: We offer free shipping on all orders over $50. Orders are typically processed within 2-3 business days.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: Have questions? Email us at support@lumo.com or call us at (123) 456-7890.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.content: Q: How do I return an item? A: Please contact our support team for a return authorization.

policy.title: Return Policy
policy.content: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.
